categories: Category:Cut content from Star Wars drafts

nodes.text: Mina Podia was a Jedi individual during the Clone Wars and was present at the Battle of Kashyyyk. Podia fought in the Battle of Kashyyyk alongside Yoda, Luminara Unduli, and Quinlan Vos. Suddenly without warning, Clone Commanders were issued Order 66, and killed all the Jedi, including Podia. Yoda and Vos however, escaped the ambush.
Mina Podia was created for Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith during pre-production. The Jedi was part of the first draft (April 13, 2003) of the movie during the Order 66 montage.
